verbs.description: MEMPHIS , Tenn. — The woman who [V: was] granted clemency by President Trump is getting her first cellphone since being released from prison .
MEMPHIS , Tenn. — [ARG2: The woman] [R-ARG2: who] was [V: granted] [ARG1: clemency] [ARG0: by President Trump] is getting her first cellphone since being released from prison .
MEMPHIS , Tenn. — The woman who was granted clemency by President Trump [V: is] getting her first cellphone since being released from prison .
MEMPHIS , Tenn. — [ARG0: The woman who was granted clemency by President Trump] is [V: getting] [ARG1: her first cellphone] [ARGM-TMP: since being released from prison] .
MEMPHIS , Tenn. — The woman who was granted clemency by President Trump is getting her first cellphone since [V: being] released from prison .
MEMPHIS , Tenn. — [ARG1: The woman who was granted clemency by President Trump] is getting her first cellphone since being [V: released] [ARG2: from prison] .
